thread.title: Now on Broadway: Harry Potter and The Shattered Box-Office Record

author: Charles Passy
title: Now on Broadway: Harry Potter and The Shattered Box-Office Record
text:
Even weeks before it opens on Broadway, “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child” is breaking box-office records.
The two-part drama, which brings the popular literary franchise to the stage, set an all-time weekly sales mark for a Broadway play, according to the Broadway League, the trade group that tracks the industry.
While still in previews,...
